Clone CD and write speed
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Laboratory: Technical Research On The Monster Rancher CD Read Process: General Q & A: Clone CD and write speed
By Dan ONeil on Sunday, August 5, 2001 - 10:07 pm:

Well thanks to those that helped with my last post in regards to the Shogun. I however tried something based on what my future Father-in-law said. I turned down the write speed in clone CD as I have only a 200mHz pentium in my comp. What do you know, a writting without any error messages from CloneCD and an Ruby Knight just as the code said it would. So for all of you that are having issues with clone CD try turning down the speed if you have a slower computer.
